name: SKELETHRONE
description:
SKELETHRONE RELOADED

the best spelunkylike on the market is back, even more goty than last year!!!

CONTROLS

X - SWAP ITEM
Z/C - USE ITEM

INTRUCTIONS

DIVE INTO DEPTHS AND REACH TEH SKELETHORNE

FEATURES
  • 60 FPS HIGH SPEED GAMEPLAY
  • 16 COLORS PALETTE TECNOLOGY
  • NEW SECRETS
  • FULLY FLEDGE DIABLO ON MOBILE

update of the classic skelethrone made for #3CJAM
